features: Chip On Board (COB) technology for water resistance and enhanced reliability
Password security feature to protect sensitive data available for download on Windows
body.description: Designed for the most discerning of USB drive users, the Metal Executive USB 3. 0 Flash Drive is the ultimate in sleek sophistication. This drive features a seamless, high-quality metal enclosure with fully encapsulated, Chip On Board (COB) technology for water-resistance and enhanced reliability. The Metal Executive is an ideal file transfer and storage solution for business and IT professionals, or other users who prefer the premium look and more substantial feel of a genuine metal enclosure. Password-security feature to protect sensitive data is available for download to use with Windows operating systems only. Drive is compatible with Windows XP, Vista, and Windows 7 and higher; Mac OS X 10. 1 and higher; Linux kernel 2. 6 and higher. It includes a key ring for added convenience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars While this one is great but expensive
reviews.reviewText: It is a beauty and a marvel of engineering. Very small for the storage capacity. It has been working well for me with no problems - fast and efficient. The only down side is that it is rather expensive for the capacity, but I figure you have to pay for design and small physical size too. While this one is great but expensive, there are a lot of drives that Amazon is blithely selling that have similar or larger stated capacities for a fraction of the price. The difference is that this one is actually 64 GB while the cheap ones are maybe 16 GB even though they claim varying but huge fake capacities.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So far, yeah... so good.
reviews.reviewText: I got this to use as a server/storage device with my ROKU Ultra. It's a pretty good home media server holding movies, music, pictures, etc... Perfect for my needs and better than watching the same media via streaming (download once, watch whenever). This drive is very sturdy, easy to plug/unplug (from various devices), and while playing 4k content, does not generate extreme heat (laptop or Roku). No notable drops or issues with playback of any media. I thought 64GB was enough for my library but... I might have to "go big" in the future.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small and Fast
reviews.reviewText: This unit is extremely small and durable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 20, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Compact durable easy to carry
reviews.reviewText: Innovative design that had me scratching my head a bit. The entire outside body fits inside the port. Thus keeping the connections from being damaged. Works flawlessly on all computers I used it in.Wish it was more clearly marked which way was front.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great and it's metal.
reviews.reviewText: I like that it's metal, has a keyring hole and comes with a keyring, plus it's fast. Works great. I hate those cheaper plastic ones.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I am just avoiding verbatim flash technology now.
reviews.reviewText: I have no complaints to the seller or the construction of the device. It's simple and solid.I got this to replace an older one.Sadly it died after only one use. I have never seen a flash drive fail so quickly. The issue must be on cheaper parts used to make the chips. They are not user serviceable being the chip and the contacts are all one solid part, unlike older flash drives. Fortunately there was no data stored. This was meant to be a small ultra durable device to pass between instruments that collect data.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Nice physical construction, but sluggish performance and no manufacturer support
reviews.reviewText: I like the metallic construction, gold color and the engraved serial number, which makes it easier to keep track of multiple devices. However, there are 2 negatives:1. I speed tested my various USB 3 drives, and this was the slowest of them all. The miniature Verbatim Store 'n' Stay Nano performed the same transfer in 2/3 of the time of the Metal Executive. The Samsung BarPlus 256 GB was 5 to 6 times faster than the Metal Executive. (I format my drives with NTFS 4k clusters.)2. I bought 5 of these drives. 4 of them worked fine, but the 5th is not be recognized in Windows 11. After extensive troubleshooting, I contacted Verbatim, but they don't respond.Update 6/10/2023: Verbatim eventually responded, but it took 4 business days. They offered an RMA but want a photo of the drive showing the capacity printed on the case. I'm returning it to Amazon.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 26, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent flashdrive for multitudes of uses
reviews.reviewText: I purchased a few of these. Some are used as boot flash drives for different utilities like Win10 installer, Macrium rescue, Gparted, and Clonezilla. All work flawlessly in that configuration under a USB 3.0 or a USB 2.0 port and boot up just fine with whatever utility I need. One I used as an MP3 storage drive for my parent's car--in which said parents were aghast that it didn't come with a CD player. Being stunned as they were that CD's are obsolete it was easy enough to rip their CDs to this drive (with a lot of space to spare for future music for them), plug it into their car, and them having all of their music at their fingertips.Would definitely recommend if 16GB is enough for your use. It's small, rugged enough, and unobtrusive on a keychain.
64GB is large enough for most day to day uses. Small, good looking and sturdy. Only negative point, I wish the hole could be a bit bigger and round. It's a little tight on the keychain ring.

reviews.reviewTitle: Funkar inte med alla USB anslutningar jag testat.
reviews.reviewText: Kompatibilitetsissues: Funkar inte med alla USB anslutningar jag testat att plugga in dem i.Annars bra pris och OK prestanda.
L ho presa per l auto ed é perfetta,piccolissima e discreta,qualitá molto buona ed ottima velocitá di lettura e scrittura,robusta e durevole,buon prezzo
